bio: The embodiment of pure evil, known throughout the Yo-kai world for terrible deeds. He will surely dine on poor Yo-kai souls again tonight!

soultimate.name: Infernal Blast
soultimate.description: Fires a giant energy blast, dealing heavy damage.

skill.effect: MM Spd ↑ when attacking, 2% ↑ per hit, lasts 4 sec.
skill.name: Red Rush

name: Rubeus J
